overview:
Wold is the President and CFO of OnRelay, a software company that delivers a Mobile Cloud Exchange platform to service providers.

Previously, Wold was a strategy consultant at Braxton Associates, Deloitte Consulting (UK), where she developed mobile voice and data strategies for global mobile operators in Europe, Asia and North America. Wold was also the Head of Deloitte’s European Communications Research Institute, where she developed Deloitte’s thought leadership platform for the communications marketplace.

Before then, Wold was a senior telecoms analyst for the United States International Trade Commission (ITC), supporting the US executive branch negotiations in the 1997 WTO agreement on Basic Telecommunications. Wold also did short stints in the US Foreign Service and the Overseas Private Investment Corporation (OPIC). Wold got her start in telecoms at the law firm of Wilmer Cutler and Pickering in Washington DC. Wold has held several Secret Security Clearances during her employment at the US Federal Government.
